speaker.name: Ivett Ördög
speaker.biography: Ivett Ördög is the founder and facilitator of Lean Poker events. She is also an Engineering Manager at Contentful, and she has been a frequent speaker at software conferences around Europe. Her passion for short feedback loops drove her to create Lean Poker, a workshop where developers have the opportunity to experiment with continuous delivery in a safe environment. Ivett is the creator and host of the Cup of Code YouTube channel inspiring the next generation of developers to broaden their knowledge.
